articles.title: Apple Watch users can finally stream Spotify without their phone - Techradar
articles.description: The watchOS app update is rolling out now
articles.content:
Up until now, if you wanted to use Spotify on your Apple Watch, the app would only act as a glorified remote youd have to do the actual streaming from your paired smartphone.
